item.title: MPW
item.description: score:225 Chances: In the closing of the recent trading day, Medical Properties (MPW) stood at $4.19, denoting a +0.24% change from the preceding trading day. As Q1 winds to a close and the economy strengthens, it is time to look at three top-performing dividend stocks.
